short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant predictions of customer responses on websites using Neurons predict AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your visual assets will never lose the spotlight again! 

Neurons Predict is our AI tool that predicts customer responses with +95% accuracy. Get validated heatmaps and cognitive scores in an instant to draw attention to your creative content. Read more about Predict here:  https://bit.ly/3Dh1csy

Neurons Predict extension provides you all the core features of Neurons Predict directly to your browser toolbar. In a single click, it takes a screenshot of your active tab and performs an extensive analysis using our AI. The results are ready instantly!



 Features
- Attention heatmaps
- Focus maps
- Cognitive and focus scores
- Areas of Interest (any shape)
- Clarity Score & Maps (Beta)
- Engagement Score & Maps (Beta)
 
 
Where can I find my API key?
 
If you are a Neurons customer, reach out to your Custom Success representative. 
If you are not a Neurons customer, book a demo with our sales team here. 
 
 
About Neurons 
Neurons is the worldâ€™s leading consumer neuroscience company.
Since 2013, we have worked with Fortune-500 companies to optimize every part of their customer journey, including advertising, retail, user experience, innovation, tech, and beyond. 


We offer a suite of neuroscience products that comprise Predict, a cloud-based, attention prediction AI; Explore, a remote neuroscience user testing platform; and Research, a bespoke, full-scale research solution.

Read more about Neurons here:  https://bit.ly/3yYSkFw
